name: Ahmed Mohammed Abdulrahman Al-Sanadi
summary: Highly motivated Software Developer and Full Stack Developer with over 4+ years of experience. Proficient in modern frameworks and technologies with strong expertise in both frontend and backend development. Passionate about solving complex problems and continuously learning new technologies to drive innovation and business success.
aboutMe: I’m a passionate full-stack developer who loves building meaningful digital products. I believe in clean code, collaboration, and lifelong learning. Outside of coding, I enjoy reading about tech trends and mentoring junior developers. My goal is to build impactful software that helps people solve real-world problems.

Built modular components for frontend and backend
Optimized for SEO and documented APIs with Postman
